mapper.select: select a.*,b.name as subtype_name,c.name as prod_name,c.spec as prod_spec,d.name as brand_name,e.name as supplier_name from (select f.*,a.subtype_id,a.prod_id,a.brand_id,a.supplier_id,a.style from ems_equipment a inner join ems_borrowlist f on a.ecode=f.ecode and f.borrow_id=#{borrow_id}) a inner join ems_equipmentsubtype b on a.subtype_id=b.id inner join ems_equipmentprod c on a.prod_id=c.id inner join ems_brand d on a.brand_id=d.id inner join ems_supplier e on a.supplier_id=e.id

select a.*,b.name as subtype_name,c.name as prod_name,c.spec as prod_spec,d.name as brand_name,e.name as supplier_name from (select f.*,a.subtype_id,a.prod_id,a.brand_id,a.supplier_id,a.style from ems_equipment a inner join ems_borrowlist f on a.ecode=f.ecode and f.borrow_id=#{borrow_id} and a.ecode=#{ecode}) a inner join ems_equipmentsubtype b on a.subtype_id=b.id inner join ems_equipmentprod c on a.prod_id=c.id inner join ems_brand d on a.brand_id=d.id inner join ems_supplier e on a.supplier_id=e.id
mapper.update: update ems_borrowlist set isReturn='Y' , returnDate=sysdate where id=#{borrowlist_id}
